views.markdown:
Version 1.3.4: Fix crash on iOS 5, and iOS 10 support Version: 1.3-3
- Revamped preferences page
- Doesn't always require killing camera app after settings changed
Version: 1.3-2
- iOS 9 support
Version: 1.1-1
- Optimization and preferences update.
Version: 1.2-6
- Code improvement.
Version: 1.2-5 - Updated code. Version: 1.2-4
- Should totally fix crash bug on iOS 7.

Version: 1.2-3
- Another crash bug fix for iOS 7.

Version: 1.2-2
- Fix crashing in iOS 7 lockscreen camera.
Version: 1.2-1
- Better iOS 8 support.
Version: 1.1-6
- Fixed bugs with Locking orientation option.

Version: 1.1-5
- Fixed some freezing bug. (iOS 7)
Version: 1.1-4
- Better Top Bar UI for Video-like mode for iOS 7
Version: 1.1-3
- 64-bit Library included.
- New rotation style for iOS 7: Video-like.

Version: 1.1-2
- Supported iOS 7

Version: 1.1-1
- Wrong description fixed.
- Restricted supported devices.
- New icon.
Version: 1.0-8
- Optimization.
Version: 1.0-7
- Supported BiteSMS. ;)

Version: 1.0-6
- iMessages app supported.

Version: 1.0-5

- Preferences bug fixed.
- Fixed images orientation not corresponding with camera orientation when they are animating to album preview.
Version 1.0-4
- Updated to work with Still Capture Enabler 1.7-6+

Version 1.0-3
- Added new feature, Allow rotation while recording Video.
Version 1.0-2
- Setting values take effect immediately, no need to close and reopen Camera again.
